did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: David Allee papers, 1960-2005.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, memoranda, subject files and reports concerning Allee's work with Resource Economics, Public Policy, and Water Quality related concerns, and the New York State Main Street Alliance, the Adirondack Research Consortium, Cornell's Water Resources and Marine Sciences Center, and Community and Rural Development Institute, and other economic development programs.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor of Resource Economics and the leader of the Cornell Local Government Program, New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences, Dept. of Applied Economics and Management.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, memoranda, subject files and reports concerning Allee's work with Resource Economics, Public Policy, and Water Quality related concerns, and the New York State Main Street Alliance, the Adirondack Research Consortium, Cornell's Water Resources and Marine Sciences Center, and Community and Rural Development Institute, and other economic development programs.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: David Allee papers, #21-43-3276. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Septics: papers and correspondence, 1999-2001; Watersheds: Federation of Lake Associations (FOLA) conference, notes, correspondence, 1998-2001

Municipal Information Exchange (MUNEX), 1996-1998; SVS and Federation; Risk Management Institute, 1981-1991; Pavement of local roads, 1985-1995; Local Governments and taxes, 1976, 1996; Yard Waste, composting, landfills, education, 1988-1993; Resource Economics proposals, 1970-1985
Land use and water Quality, risk assessment and groundwater protection strategies, research papers
